title: OJS HTTP Fetch Request
description: Request body for POST /ojs/v1/workers/fetch. Claims one or more jobs from the specified queues for processing by a worker.

queues.title: Queues
queues.description: Ordered list of queues to fetch from. Queue priority is left-to-right: the first queue is checked first.

count.title: Count
count.description: Maximum number of jobs to fetch in this request. Default is 1.

worker_id.title: Worker ID
worker_id.description: Unique identifier for the worker process requesting jobs.

visibility_timeout_ms.title: Visibility Timeout (ms)
visibility_timeout_ms.description: How long the job is reserved before being reclaimed if the worker does not ACK or FAIL it. In milliseconds. Default is 30000.
